name: Lotion Kart
description:
Lotion Kart is a local multiplayer racing game where you can race your friends across a cityscape.

Controls:
Controls are listed in game. 4 Laps to win.

Disclaimer: This game is designed for two players.

Local Multiplayer:
Play with a friend. (2 player racing)Supports Xbox and PlayStation controllers

Lore:
A lotion bottle named Mo from Planet Lotio lives happily, until his planet is threatened by an entity known as The Menace. The Menace wreaks havoc upon Planet Lotio but offers solace if Mo can win the racing tournament he is hosting.

Platforms:
Linux x86_64, Windows

Engine:
Godot Engine

School:
Northwest Career & Technical Academy

Class:
Video Game Development
